name: Seedship (itch) (GRASBOCK, Excendia)
description:
You play an AI guiding humanity's last hope in search for a new planet in space. Taking into account orbital mechanics you need to explore different solar systems to find  suitable planet!

Use WASD to control your spaceship. Avoid asteroids. Get close to planets and match their velocity to start interacting by pressing E. Choose wisely!

Requires Java 17

Made by GRASBOCK and Excendia for the 9th Brackeys GameJam

Inspired by Seedship
